entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 3:57 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing rain or ice pellets early this evening. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
